title: American Horror Story: The Best of Cody Fern
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: Where does Cody Fern's Michael Langdon rank in your all-time favorite AHS characters?
There’s something about him in apocalypse that was absolutely sexy as hell
Cody fern radiates an excessive unwarranted big daddy energy.
His blue eyes, plus that red eye shadow compliments his overall look. Also the flowy hair is fabulous.
They’re lucky they found him because he’s the one keeping the audience coming back at this point
description:
Cody Fern has played the Antichrist and an aerobics instructor. GameSpot Universe breaks down both characters played by the AHS newcomer.

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
